![Kenneth Gregg](https://www.jacksonvilleor.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1353 "Kenneth Gregg")

# Ken Gregg

 

[City Council](https://www.jacksonvilleor.us/Directory.aspx?DID=13)  
Title: Council Member  
Phone: 831-320-3754  
[Email Ken Gregg](mailto:councilorgregg@jacksonvilleor.us)

Ken grew up in Santa Barbara, California, then attended the University of California at Berkeley where he received a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Administration.  

Following a passion for photography that he had from the time he was 10 years old, he went to work for North Face backpacking company as their catalogue photographer. A decade later, he went out on his own as a fine art photographer, selling his artwork for interior décor to luxury hotels around the world.

In 2013, he and his partner moved from California to Jacksonville where he was soon elected to the City Council in 2015 and is currently on his third term. His passion for history led to his producing a permanent exhibit of historic photographs in New City Hall. He is currently working on developing a new history museum for the town.
